About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I have been a lawyer for 5 years, but in 2018 I have been crach into web-development and start my self edication in web-dev. In march of 2019 i have gotten a first job offer and get first commercial experience in Smart-journal comany, where i developing with team an application which allow customers to manage their clients visits and money transactions. In december 2019 i have gotten next job offer and join to FDI Ukriane company, where i was developing with team a smart-city products for capital of Ukraine and other cities.
Have experience with: JavaScript(es6+), typeScript, HTML, CSS (LESS, SASS, SCSS), styled-componets, React, NextJs, redux (saga, thunk), Vue, NuxtJs, Ant-design, Material-UI, Vuetify, Semantic-UI, BootStrap, Webpack, NodeJs, express, MongoDB, Firebase

FDI Ukraine

Front-end developer

december 2019 – current time (full-time)

developed admin applications from scratch on vuejs, reactjs. Suport live projects. Implement features:
CMS - implement ability to localize errors, manage votings and news, comments, watch statistic, change statuses. Manage agreements GDPR.
auth-service - cross-browser, responsive markup, add new pages and routes, save in localstorage last login option and show for user.
notification-admin-module - developed from scratch, allow admin to config sms and email notifications for auth-service users, show statisctic and notifications statuses, look all users.
documents-admin-module - developed from scratch, allow admin to config systems, scripts, files for integrates seriveces.
service-provider-register - implement ability to check subject in goverment register
